full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG BLO BZANG DGONGS RGYAN GYI RTZA TSIG BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @007A *, ,CES THEG PA CHEN PO'I BLO SBYONG BLO BZANG DGONGS RGYAN GYI SNYING PO BSDUS PA'I RTZA TSIG 'DI LTA BU ZHIG DGOS ZHES MDO SNGAGS GZHUNG BRGYA SMRA BA'I DGE BA'I BSHES GNYEN DANG GLING MKHAN PO RAB 'BYAMS PA CHOS DBANG RGYA MTSOS BSKUL ZHING, ,RANG DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA DAG LA PHAN DU DE DE BA'I BSAM PAS DGE SLONG YE SHE RGYAL MTSAN GYIS BKRA SHIS BSAM GTAN GLING DU SBYAR BA'O, ,'DIS KYANG THEG PA CHEN PO'I BSTAN PA PHYOGS KUN TU DAR ZHING RGYAS LA YUN RING DU GNAS PAR GYUR CIG , ,,
